bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High Voltage (> 1000 V) Expulsion and Current-limiting Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches
IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High Voltage (> 1000 V) Expulsion and Current-limiting Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.46/D5, Sept 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Specifications for high voltage (above 1000 volts) expulsion and current-limiting type power class fuses, fuse disconnecting switches, their associated fuse links, disconnecting cutouts, and accessories for these devices are covered. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating current distribution systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
